Key Match Events: Cape Verde's forward Bebe scored a 40-yard free kick.
Captain Ryan Mendes doubled Cape Verde's lead after a defensive lapse.
Kevin Pina secured the victory with a brilliant strike into the top corner from outside the box.
Geny Catamo of Mozambique won a penalty in the first half, but it was overturned by VAR.
Geny Catamo hit the crossbar with a free kick and had one of Mozambique's two shots on goal.
Post-Match Reflections: Cape Verde's victory secures top spot in Group B, ahead of former champions Egypt and Ghana, with one game remaining.
Cape Verde will face a third-place finisher from Group A, C, or D in the round of 16.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cape Verde, ranked 73rd in the world, is in its fourth Africa Cup of Nations, having advanced from the group stage in three of them.
Mozambique, ranked 111th in the FIFA rankings, were soundly defeated.
